data.text: @HagenGillis @CBCNS Stop listening to the media. Stop buying into the fear. 3 weeks of “unvaxxed scum” in Ottawa. No outbreaks. What does that tell you? Cases are pointless. People get sick and they die. Like they have been forever. It’s time to realize we’ve been lied to.
@CBCNS Go back to unknown obscurity where you belong. Your 15 mins is way past due.
@seaforthdoctari @AgainstRallyNS @ChickenClimate @CBCNS While the “leader” of the country has a large financial stake in the nano particle production company. That’s ok right?
@Janet25127309 @CBCNS I hear ya. I’m sick of seeing this shill’s face dragged out every day to scare the people a little more. Enough of this person.
@RCAstudios @CBCNS You and most other Nova Scotians have worshipped at the alter of Strang for two years and now you don’t take what he says as learned info. Y’all are hilarious.
@zharrion @HagenGillis @CBCNS This is a man made virus. It has been proven.

@seaforthdoctari @ChickenClimate @CBCNS Tell me you aren’t a scientist without telling me you aren’t  a scientist. Stick to what you know bud. You need to change it up a bit. Anti everything are spewing the same nonsense … every since day. 🙄 https://t.co/QoejvIkRrl
@CBCNS If your vaxxed and wearing a mask what exactly are you worried about? Others living their life? Seriously get over yourself.
